results.title: Simvastatin attenuates lipopolysaccharide-induced airway mucus hypersecretion in rats.
results.text_hl: Moreover, @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ inhibited @<m>DISEASE_Neutrophil_Immunodeficiency_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C564275 @@@neutrophil@@@ accumulation and the increased concentration of @GENE_TNF @GENE_24835 @@@TNF-alpha@@@ and IL-8 in BALF follows @CHEMICAL_Lipopolysaccharides @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008070 @@@LPS@@@ stimulation (P < 0.05).

citations.NLM: Ou XM, Wang BD, Wen FQ, Feng YL, Huang XY, Xiao J. Simvastatin attenuates lipopolysaccharide-induced airway mucus hypersecretion in rats. Chin Med J (Engl). 2008 Sep 5;121(17):1680-7. PMID: 19024099

results.title: Simvastatin antagonizes CD40L secretion, CXC chemokine formation, and pulmonary infiltration of neutrophils in abdominal sepsis.
results.text_hl: Herein, we hypothesized that @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ may attenuate @<m>DISEASE_Neutrophil_Immunodeficiency_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C564275 @@@neutrophil@@@ activation and @DISEASE_Lung_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D008171 @@@lung damage@@@ in @DISEASE_Abdominal_Injuries @DISEASE_MESH:D000007 @@@abdominal sepsis@@@.

citations.NLM: Zhang S, Rahman M, Zhang S, Qi Z, Thorlacius H. Simvastatin antagonizes CD40L secretion, CXC chemokine formation, and pulmonary infiltration of neutrophils in abdominal sepsis. J Leukoc Biol. 2011 May;89(5):735-42. PMID: 21330348
